ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Re: Hello...I am new here....yes...yes I am
ygData.msgSnippet: No. This is a group for people who play or are interested in playing the online roleplaying game EverQuest. On some servers you can fight each other-- they are
ygData.messageBody:
No. This is a group for people who play or are interested in playing the
online roleplaying game EverQuest.
On some servers you can fight each other-- they are labelled as PvP (player
versus player). No roleplaying actually occurs on this list.
If you are interested in obtaining more information on the game you can go
to http://everquest.station.sony.com
luv,
-Su


>
> Is this a roleplaying group were you fight each other.
